prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a tough exterior and unique camouflage features.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a pinecone but has eyes that express emotions.
Imagine a steel-type Pokemon that can roll into a ball and protect itself.
Generate a creature that looks like a forest guardian, combining natural elements with a rocky texture.
Make a Pokemon inspired by nature that has both a defensive and offensive combat style.
Design an adorable yet sturdy Pokemon that can blend into its forest habitat effortlessly.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and has a spiky appearance.
